main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a stationary, cigar-shaped black object in the sky for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was long like a cigar with a round section underneath.
The object disappeared behind a building while the observer was driving through town.
The observer was fairly certain about the duration of the sighting.
The object did not appear to move or change brightness.
The observer compared the object's appearance to a circular, silver-metallic saucer shape.
